title: Top Places to visit in Baloda Bazar, Chhattisgarh
content: Baloda Bazar city is a nagar palika parishad in Baloda Bazar district in the state of Chhattisgarh, India. PIN 493332. It is recently declared as a District. Baloda Bazar is also called Cement hub of Chhattisgarh because there are many reputed Cement Plants. Ultra Tech Cement Hirmi, Grasim Cement
